Korede Bello (amụrụ na 29 Febụwarị 1996) bụ onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-ede egwu na Naijiria. Ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta ndekọ na Mavin Records na 2014
A maara Bello nke ọma maka egwu ya bụ "Godwin", abụ ọkara ozioma na egwu pop nke ghọrọ abụ mba ma nọrọ n'elu ọtụtụ chaatị egwu gafee Naịjirịa.
A mụrụ Korede (English:"Bring Fortune") na Lagos State, ebe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ praịmarị na sekọndrị ya  Ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ dị afọ asaa ma jiri aha egwu African Prince.

Mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị, Korede Bello gara n'ihu dee abụ mbụ ya mgbe ya na enyi ya guzobere otu egwu. Ọ malitere egwu n'ụzọ ọkachamara site na idekọ egwu na studio mgbe ọ nọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị, ma mesịa wepụta egwu mbụ ya "Forever". Ọ gụrụ Mass Communication na Nigerian Institute of Journalism ma nwee asambodo Higher National Diploma
Korede Bello bụ onye mmekọ nke Institute of Information Management

Mgbe a weputara egwu mbụ ya nke nwetara nyocha dị mma, onye njikwa ya bụ Casmir Uwaegbute mere ka ọ mata Don Jazzy mgbe nke ahụ gasịrị, ha dekọrọ ụfọdụ egwu ọnụ nke mere ka Don Jazzy nwee mmasị. Na 28 Febụwarị 2014, ọ bịanyere aka na Mavin Records n'okpuru nke o dekọrọ egwu ndị a ma ama dị ka "African Princess" na "Godwin". Ọ na-arụ ọrụ ugbu a na abọm studio mbụ ya ma kwuo Asa na 2face Idibia dị ka ndị ọ na-enweta mkpali.
Korede Bello etinyela aka n'ọtụtụ ọrụ enyemaka dịka Project Pink Blue Walk for Cancer awareness program na Abuja, n'afọ 2015 na 2017.
